mapper.sql: ybid, gh, xm, sj, yx, state,ywfw
mapper.select: select x.ybid,x.ywfw,y.c state from jdr x LEFT JOIN (select count(ybid) c,ybid from jdr j,bxd b where j.ybid = b.jid and j.state = 1 and TO_DAYS(b.sbsj)=TO_DAYS(now()) GROUP BY ybid) y on x.ybid = y.ybid order by state

select j.*,dqds,zjds,pjpj from jdr j LEFT JOIN ( select * from (select count(b.id) dqds,j.ybid did from bxd b,jdr j where b.jid = j.ybid and (b.state = 1 or b.state = 2) GROUP BY j.ybid) d, (select count(b.id) zjds,j.ybid zid from bxd b,jdr j where b.jid = j.ybid and b.state != 4 GROUP BY j.ybid) z, (select floor(AVG(b.pj)) pjpj,j.ybid aid from bxd b,jdr j where b.jid = j.ybid GROUP BY j.ybid) a ) x on j.ybid = x.did and j.ybid = x.zid and j.ybid = x.aid
where j.state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select j.ybid, j.gh, j.xm, j.sj, j.yx, j.state,j.ywfw from bxqy qy, ewm e, qdb qd, jdr j where e.qid = qy.id and qd.shyid = j.ybid and qd.state = 1 and qd.xq = qy.xq and j.state = 1 and j.ywfw like "%"#{bxlb}"%" and e.id = #{eid}
